channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 22:42 Alarm lifted in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 22:42 Alarm lifted in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages. #Mykolaiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city. Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter!
